name: react-tabs
description: A faster React tab component that doesn't use DOM refs.

scripts.build: rm -Rf dist/* && webpack --progress --colors && cp index.html dist/ && mkdir -p dist/css && stylus styles/index.styl -o dist/css/ -u autoprefixer-stylus
scripts.watch: webpack-dev-server --content-base dist/ && stylus styles/index.styl -o dist/css/ -u autoprefixer-stylus --watch

author: Eric Schaefer, Max Hoffman
